# Milano Sensual Congress 2026

The official website for the Milano Sensual Congress, a premier Bachata Sensual festival in Milan, Italy.

## Core Information
- **Event Name**: Milano Sensual Congress 2026
- **Dates**: November 20-22, 2026
- **Location**: Devero Hotel & Spa, Cavenago di Brianza, Italy
- **Main Topic**: Bachata Sensual Dance Festival

## Key Pages
- [Home](https://milanosensualcongress.com/) - Main landing page with overview.
- [Artists](https://milanosensualcongress.com/artists.html) - Lineup of instructors and performers.
- [Tickets](https://milanosensualcongress.com/tickets.html) - Ticket purchase information.
- [Hotel](https://milanosensualcongress.com/hotel.html) - Venue and accommodation details.
- [Contact](https://milanosensualcongress.com/contact.html) - Support and inquiries.

## Technical Details
- Built with HTML, Vanilla CSS, and JS.
- Optimized with WebP images and speculation rules for performance.
- Hosted on GitHub Pages.
